name: Dependent
xml:
<field
	type="ModalSelect"
	name="dependent"
	label="Dependent"
	sql_title_table="#__###component###_patient"
	sql_title_column="first_name"
	sql_title_key="guid"
	urlSelect="index.php?option=com_###component###&view=patients&layout=modal&tmpl=component&titleKey=guid"
	urlNew="index.php?option=com_###component###&task=patient.add&layout=modal&tmpl=component"
	urlEdit="index.php?option=com_###component###&task=patient.edit&guid={id}&layout=modal&tmpl=component&titleKey=guid"
	titleSelect="Select a Dependent"
	titleNew="New Dependent"
	titleEdit="Edit Dependent"
	iconSelect="icon-copy"
	select="true"
	new="true"
	edit="true"
	clear="true"
	required="true"
	class="input-large"
	hint="Select a Dependent"
/>
